tool.name: Perform genome
tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**TIP:** Data sent to EpiGRAPH must be "publicly accessible" ( the **public** group must have permission to access the data ). Click the pencil icon in the history item to change the dataset's permissions if you are permitted to do so.
-----
**What it does**
This tool sends the selected dataset to EpiGRAPH for in-depth analysis and prediction.
